#summary Show potential maintainers how to set up the OM projects with Eclipse

= What you need =

You need to download Eclipse (http://www.eclipse.org) (pref. Eclipse 3.3) and install the Subclipse plugin.

= How to check out the Project =

Create a new project under Eclipse choosing to pull the source code from SVN:

https://db4o-om.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
